Database interfaces
===================

You can open a `*.txt` file using Notepad, Word, Excel  or even your web browser.
Similarly you can access a database using various interfaces. 

## Interfaces to MySQL/MariaDB  

##### Web browser interfaces
 * <a href="http://scidb.mpio.orn.mpg.de/phpmyadmin/" target="_blank"> phpmyadmin </a> 

##### Database software installed locally on your PC
 * <a href="http://www.heidisql.com/" target="_blank">                                                                             HeidySQL </a>
 * <a href="https://www.mysql.de/why-mysql/windows/excel/" target="_blank">                                                        MySQL for Excel</a>       
 * <a href="https://www.mysql.de/products/workbench/"  target="_blank">                                                            MySQL Workbench</a>       
 * <a href="http://extensions.openoffice.org/en/project/mysql-connector-openofficeorg/" target="_blank">                           MySQL for OpenOffice</a>  
 * <a href="http://dev.mysql.com/doc/connectors/en/connector-odbc-examples-tools-with-access-linked-tables.html" target="_blank">  MySQL for MS Access</a>   


##### R-based interfaces
 *  [sdb (internal package)](http://scidb.mpio.orn.mpg.de)
 * [RMySQL](https://cran.r-project.org/package=RMySQL)
